metadata.name: Gilgamesh The Immortal
metadata.description:
Gilgamesh the immortal tells the tale of Gilgamesh's pursuit of immortality like never before. 

Tapping into a history that never was, the playful twist and retelling of one of history's oldest tale comes in both digital and physical forms. The NFT is set to come with a 30cm tall toy that is truly one of a kind.

Gilgamesh makes his debut at the Bahrain Pavilion in Expo 2020 Dubai - 01/02/2022

Commissioned by Bahrain Authority for Culture and Antiquities
